data.actual_result: When opening the emoji picker, Discord hangs and finally crashes and a pop-up appears saying "Unfortunately, Discord has crashed".
data.short_description: When trying to open emoji picker (while keeping keyboard open) when your device is charging, discord crashes [Seems to happen only on devices that get overheated when charging].
data.steps_to_repro: - Start charging your phone. - Keep using Discord (for some time) while your phone is charging (to heat it up a bit). - Keeping you keyboard open, try to open the emoji picker.
